description: Spearheaded the development of multiple key products at Happay, with a focus on crafting seamless, responsive, and user-centric digital experiences.
Led and contributed to the end-to-end development of several platforms using ReactJs, Redux, and JavaScript, emphasizing Progressive Web Apps (PWA) and Responsive Web Design (RWD).
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions, ensuring cross-platform compatibility and maintaining a high standard of user experience.
Integrated GraphQL to optimize data fetching, reducing latency and improving application performance across various products.

projects.title: BBPS B2B Payments Platform (Delight - Platform)
description: Developed in collaboration with Bharat Connect and NPCI, this platform was showcased at the Global Fintech Fest (GFF)
Created a responsive payment solution using ReactJs and Redux within a PWA and RWD framework.

projects.title: Widgets - UI Library
description: Initiated and led the end-to-end development of a pioneering product with a proprietary NPM library. Ensured cross-platform compatibility and standardized user experience across multiple products.
Developed an extensive suite of adaptable widgets, showcasing proficiency in creating scalable and reusable components.

projects.title: Invoice Solution
description: Pioneered the creation of an innovative invoice product using ReactJs, Redux, and React Router. Developed responsive components, showcasing a commitment to delivering adaptable and user-centric applications.
Demonstrated expertise in ReactJs, Redux, and React Router for seamless execution and feature-rich product development.

projects.title: Cards Platform
description: Spearheaded the development of a comprehensive B2B Cards product with diverse responsive components. Mastery of ReactJs, Redux, and React Router resulted in a seamlessly integrated and highly responsive product.
Active involvement in optimizing user experience across various devices, emphasizing adaptability and user-centric design.

projects.title: Travel Portal
description: Single-handedly led the development of critical components, emphasizing adaptability and user-centric design. Actively participated in the transformation of the entire application into a PWA, showcasing a commitment to staying at the forefront of technological advancements.
Hands-on experience with ReactJs, Flux, and Redux highlights a deep understanding of modern front-end technologies.

projects.title: Analytics
description: Conceived, developed, and maintained a sophisticated analytics product. Proficient in crafting custom configurations for charts and tables, reflecting a dedication to delivering impactful and user-friendly applications.
Hands-on experience underscores proficiency in analytics tool development and autonomous delivery of end-to-end solutions.
Utilized GraphQL to efficiently fetch and manage large datasets, enabling real-time data visualization and interaction.

projects.title: Expense Portal
description: Played a pivotal role in developing the Expense portal, focusing on intricate logical implementations. Actively participated in the development of crucial components such as OCR configuration and KYC, showcasing proficiency in logical problem-solving and advanced front-end technologies.
Contributions highlight an ability to excel in challenging and detail-oriented projects.

projects.title: ISAC
description: Led the comprehensive development of ISAC, a product built entirely from scratch using ReactJs, Redux, and React Router. Meticulously crafted as a Progressive Web App (PWA) for optimal accessibility.

Steered the creation of detailed API documentation, demonstrating technical proficiency and effective communication skills. PWA and mobile responsiveness highlight a commitment to cutting-edge solutions.
